content.p: We hope you have found this information useful; however, we realise that you may have more questions about the care of your child. Please do not hesitate to contact us by telephone or email or by popping in to the Day Nursery or Playcentre. Rhonda Mawer Childcare Services Senior Administrator t: +44 (0)115 951 5222 e: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk Livia Bullock Childcare Services Senior Administrator t: +44 (0)115 951 5222 e: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk Gemma Wilshaw Childcare Services Senior Manager t: +44 (0)115 951 5222 e: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk Jo Whalen Deputy Childcare Services Operational Manager (Day Nursery) t: +44 (0)115 951 5222 e: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk Joanne Smith Deputy Childcare Services Operational Manager (Playcentre) t: +44 (0)115 951 4798 e: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5222 email: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk The use of images from this site is strictly prohibited. Images are not to be used or reproduced under any circumstances.
